channel.title: Scale Your Code Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Christophe Limpalair
channel.itunes:subtitle: Interviews of proven developers
channel.itunes:summary: This podcast asks technical and philosophical questions to programmers who have put in the 10,000+ hours of hard work so that you can learn from their mistakes and successes. Topics include but are not limited to: scaling web apps to millions of users, securing servers, automation, building APIs, building WordPress plugins, JavaScript, etc...
channel.description: Learn from proven developers through interviews.
